name: 霍弘毅
objective: In thus half of the course we will graduate from paragraph construction to construction of an essay that involves some research.  At the end of the course you will produce a short research paper complete with an introduction, body, citations and a works cited page.  We will go slowly, slowly step by step through the whole process.
schedule:
Pt I: Review Basic Grammar and Style: The Sentence

Pt II: Review Paragraph development: The Nine Modes
	Narration
	Description
	Exemplification
	Analogy
	Comparison/Contrast
	Definition
	Process
	Cause/Effect
	Division/Classification

Pt. III	A Finding a topic.
	B Developing a topic
	C Learning about a topic: Research
	D Finding a narrow topic
	E Finding a research question
	F Answering the research question: Working Thesis/Final Thesis
	G Constructing the final paper from Introduction to Conclusion
scorePolicy:
Basic grammar and style review exam: 10%
Paragraph development review: 10%
Mid term exam: 20%
Final Research Essay: 60%
